sound: 01-fatal bazooka - Ce Matin Va Être Une Pure Soirée.wav
Where did you put the folder sound.txt

_sText:
The anti-terror begin either in the arms factory, or in the post "CT". They can buy directly their weapons in the store, or then take a weapon of the arms factory or the post "CT". The terrorists begin in cells without weapons, except the knife. But 4 weapons are hidden there and 1 secret passage in 2 differentes cells... Other weapons and secret passages are presents in the map. 
As zones there is: 
- Cells 
- The arms factory 
- The post "CT" 
- The infirmary 
- The cage 
- The kitchen 
- The polling booth 
- The Mirador 
- The labyrinth 
- The soccer field 
- The swimming pool

Novelties : 
- Room of showers 
- Disco 
- Shooting range 
- A footbridge between mirador and the top of the swimming pool and another footbridge between the top of the swimming pool and the top of cells 
- A glass at the top of the mirador and the scout and the dual elite were deleted
- The secret passage of the polling booth was delected but other one was created
- A big secret passage between the room of showers, the polling booth and the cage
- Now, we can go out pipes by 3 other places
- All the traversables walls were replaced by real walls
- Weapons of the arms factory and the post "CT" have more ammunitions
